label: 位封
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Taxable households (kako) given to all four orders of Imperial Princes (Shinnō) and to those of the Third Rank (Sam-mi) and above, ranging in amounts from 800 households (ko) to Imperial Princes of the First Order (Ip-pon) to 100 households to persons of the Junior Third Rank (Jū-sam-mi ). [課戸、親王、三位、戸、一品、従三位]
